mapper.sql: SUP_INFO_NUM, SUP_NAME, SUP_UNAME, CONTACTS, FIXED_TEL, TELPHONE, FAX, EMAIL, OPEN_BANK, BANK_NATURE, COM_INDEX, EFFECTIVE_ORNOT, OPERATOR_ID, REMARKS_INFO, COM_ID, LAST_DATE, BANK_NUMBER
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from PUR_SUP_INFO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into PUR_SUP_INFO (SUP_INFO_NUM, SUP_NAME, SUP_UNAME, CONTACTS, FIXED_TEL, TELPHONE, FAX, EMAIL, OPEN_BANK, BANK_NATURE, COM_INDEX, EFFECTIVE_ORNOT, OPERATOR_ID, REMARKS_INFO, COM_ID, LAST_DATE, BANK_NUMBER) values (#{supInfoNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{supName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supUname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixedTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankNature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comIndex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effectiveOrnot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remarksInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bankNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update PUR_SUP_INFO
SUP_INFO_NUM = #{record.supInfoNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SUP_NAME = #{record.supName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUP_UNAME = #{record.supUname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACTS = #{record.contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIXED_TEL = #{record.fixedTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELPHONE = #{record.telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAX = #{record.fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

OPEN_BANK = #{record.openBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

EFFECTIVE_ORNOT = #{record.effectiveOrnot,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATOR_ID = #{record.operatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARKS_INFO = #{record.remarksInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COM_ID = #{record.comId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_DATE = #{record.lastDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BANK_NUMBER = #{record.bankNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update PUR_SUP_INFO set SUP_INFO_NUM = #{record.supInfoNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUP_NAME = #{record.supName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUP_UNAME = #{record.supUname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACTS = #{record.contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIXED_TEL = #{record.fixedTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELPHONE = #{record.telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAX = #{record.fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPEN_BANK = #{record.openBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_NATURE = #{record.bankNature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COM_INDEX = #{record.comIndex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EFFECTIVE_ORNOT = #{record.effectiveOrnot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR_ID = #{record.operatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARKS_INFO = #{record.remarksInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COM_ID = #{record.comId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_DATE = #{record.lastDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BANK_NUMBER = #{record.bankNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SUP_NAME = #{supName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUP_UNAME = #{supUname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACTS = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where SUP_INFO_NUM = #{supInfoNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
